title: Reinforcement Learning Contemplation (RLC)

definitions.RLC: RLC is a novel LMSI method, which is grounded on the observation that it is simpler for a language model to evaluate a sentence than to generate it.

summary: The slide introduces Reinforcement Learning Contemplation (RLC), a new method in Language Model Self-Improvement (LMSI). It explains that RLC is based on the observation that it's easier for a language model to evaluate a sentence than to generate it. The slide also includes a diagram showing the process of text generation and evaluation, with a language model being used in both steps.
